modName: No Vampire Sunken Face for ECE - BFG - The Ashen Race and Vanilla Males
summary: This mod will remove the ugly vampire sunken faces on your character, and the great part is that it\'s for Enhanced Character Edit , BFG- Better FaceGen , and The Ashen Race mod users!
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]8/29/1012 UPDATE: The Ashen version has been fixed and uploaded as v1.1, mean to work with The Ashen v2_5. Now it will work correctly even when using NMM or dragging and dropping the Data folder.[/color]

This mod will remove the ugly vampire sunken faces on your character, and the great part is that it\'s for Enhanced Character Edit, BFG- Better FaceGen, and The Ashen Race mod users!
[b]I made this mod, so together with other vampire appearance mods, players can revert their characters to look before vampirism without compromising save games/character variables. This allows for Pre-Dawnguard support.[/b]

[b]List of Mods this works for:[/b]
=====
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit by tktk[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8583]The Ashen Race - HD by Seren4XX and RadioRagae[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953]BFG - Better FaceGen by Radioragae[/url]

[b][color=red]NOTE: If you do not use any custom FaceGen Mods, in other words you use Vanilla Females, then I suggest downloading the \"Vampire Face Less Sunken Cheeks\" mod for vanilla by Devacore found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16506]here[/url].
For Males, I have a Vanilla Male version in the optional section![/b][/color]
[b][color=lightblue]MODDERS: Feel free to PM me any requests you would like concerning my mod, IE customizing it for your custom Race mod etc.[/b][/color]

Installation for ECE, BFG, or The Ashen Race Version:
=====
- FIRST Install ECE, BFG, or The Ashen Race
- Drop into your DATA folder AFTER, or use NMM, as it overrides the femaleheadchargen.tri file that the above mods also use.

Uninstallation:
=====
- Replace the femaleheadchargen.tri file in \"Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\" with the previous version; or simply uninstall via NMM.

Installation for Vanilla Male Version:
=====
- Simply Extract into your Data folder or use NMM

Notes:
=====
- Be sure to use the correct version in the \"Optional\" section of the files area on this page, for your respective mod and version.
- The Optional Male version is for Vanilla.
- If you are looking for a mod that removes the \"burnt\" look. [url=1148]Check out Vampire Face Fix by Fatalmasterpiece[/url]

Recommended Mods:
=====
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9717]Better Vampires by Brehanin 5_4[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22528]My Vampire Eyes by Acolyte598[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22522]Female Vampires Have Fangs by Acdale[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20807]Female Vampire Eye Fix by jaked11[/url] For those that have female vamps that show hazel eyes instead of vamp
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1148]Vampire Face Fix V1_0 by Fatalmasterpiece[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8583]The Ashen Race - HD by Seren4XX and RadioRagae[/url]

[center]Feel free to check out some of my images in the nexus gallery!
Click the thumbnails to see them larger.

[url=119633][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/thumbnails/4926839-1344029545.jpg[/img][/url] [url=118710][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/thumbnails/4926839-1343860768.jpg[/img][/url] [url=121472][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/thumbnails/4926839-1344372512.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
